attributes.action: Allow a range British Beer to be savailable at the Olympic Games
attributes.additional_details:
The sole "pouring rights" for all Olympic venues have been given to Dutch Brewer Heineken. No beers or ales from the British Isles will be on display or sold.

The Department for Culture Media and Sport must reverse this arrangement.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the London Organising Committee of the Olympic Games (LOCOG).
